enhanced_by.reason: The render method relies heavily on safelyAppend to write to the output stream, ensuring that the state of the output stream is managed correctly.
The render method calls listEndpoints to list different types of endpoints, ensuring that these lists are generated before proceeding with other rendering tasks.
Both render and ol_changed methods handle the rendering of changed operations, making ol_changed a good candidate for assertions related to the rendering of operations.
The render method uses title to format titles in the output, making it a good candidate for assertions related to the formatting of titles.
